job_tasks.phrase: craft the infrastructure, libraries and tooling to support data ingestion, processing, monitoring and lineage at DeepL.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and maintaining the foundational systems (infrastructure, libraries, tooling) that enable data operations, which aligns with the definition of developing and integrating software components.

job_tasks.phrase: Administer Kafka clusters that play a central role for data exchange in the company
job_tasks.justification: Administering Kafka clusters, a key component for data exchange, falls under the umbrella of managing and integrating software systems and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up and maintain third party tools in Kubernetes that are used for data visualization, discovery and lineage
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and maintaining tools within Kubernetes is a direct example of integrating and managing software systems and their infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring in Prometheus and Grafana - you build and set up solutions that make sure our systems are operating smoothly
job_tasks.justification: Building and setting up monitoring solutions using Prometheus and Grafana directly relates to ensuring system operability and performance, which is a core aspect of operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Help improve our CI/CD framework for reliable builds and deployments
job_tasks.justification: Improving CI/CD frameworks is a direct task within the realm of operations and MLOps, focused on automating and ensuring reliable software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Write tools and services in Go and Python
job_tasks.justification: Writing tools and services in specific programming languages is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: The main goal of the Data Platform is to combine different data sources, both internal and external, and make them available to our stakeholders company-wide: Developers, Product Development, Data Science and Management.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence explains the purpose and business value of the data platform, highlighting how it supports stakeholders and enables data-driven decisions, which falls under understanding business context and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: We provide support at all stages of the data lifecycle to ensure that users can access the data they need to make data-driven decisions and to provide a framework for high data quality and transparent data security.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business objective of the platform – enabling data-driven decisions and ensuring data quality/security – which aligns with understanding business needs and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights working within a diverse, international team, which implies a need for strong collaboration and communication skills across different cultures.

job_tasks.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the value placed on open communication, feedback, and collaboration, directly mapping to the 'Communication & Collaboration' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of an annual learning budget and the statement 'because we never stop learning' directly indicates a focus on continuous learning and professional development.

job_tasks.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
job_tasks.justification: Hack Fridays, where employees can pursue passionate projects and work with other teams, demonstrate a value for initiative, impact, and creativity, aligning with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
soft_skills.justification: Working in a diverse, international team implies a need for strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions valuing clear communication, honest feedback, and smooth collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on continuous learning and professional development through a dedicated budget indicates a focus on learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
soft_skills.justification: The mention of valuing initiatives, impact, and creativity, especially in the context of hack Fridays, points towards innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on infrastructure, data platform automation, CI/CD, monitoring, and writing tools/services in Go and Python. While it mentions data ingestion and processing, there is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, LLMs, prompt engineering, or related specialized tasks. The core responsibilities fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically 1.A.1 (Software Development & Integration) and 1.A.2 (Operations & MLOps). There are no tasks that fall under Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization). Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on infrastructure and data platform automation. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML specific tasks, making the classification straightforward. The technologies and responsibilities listed are all within the scope of traditional software engineering and operations.
